description.value:
Trigger A living creature attempts to exit the room

Effect The cavern erupts into terrified cries as a deep rumbling fills the room. All creatures in area C12 must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:22] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). The haunt then rolls initiative.

details.description: Bodiless screams arise as the room rumbles and shakes, as if in the grip of an earthquake.
details.disable: @Check[religion|dc:23] (expert) to exorcise the spirits or @Check[intimidation|dc:23] to stand resolute and show the spirits there's nothing to fear; three total successes are required to disable this haunt.
details.reset: The haunt deactivates once no living creatures are in the cave at the end of a round, then resets 1 hour later as the spiritual energy rebuilds to a breaking point.
details.routine:
(1 action; illusion, mental) A thunderous explosion rocks the room as the ceiling appears to split open and collapse. This cave-in is an illusion formed from the memories of the dead, but it can inflict real damage. All creatures in the room must attempt a @Check[will|dc:22|traits:illusion,mental] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[1d10[mental]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(1d10+6)[mental]] damage and believes the room is filling with rubble—they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the start of their next turn as they spend their energy navigating the illusory rockfall.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[(2d10+12)[mental]] damage and believes they're pinned by rubble—they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] until the start of their next turn.
